snippet.title: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - Story Trailer
snippet.description:
(Italian, Japanese, French, German & Spanish subs available)

Take a sneak peak at the deep story of Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night. Hear the live orchestra sound tracks and celebrity voice acting in action for the first time ever. 

The Beta Backer Demo launches today exclusively for backers at the $60 tier and above, thank you to all our fans for your support!   

For more information visit:

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/692850/Bloodstained__Ritual_of_the_Night/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bloodstainedrotn/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SwordOrWhip
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/bloodstained

Bloodstained does not currently have an official release date, but we will be announcing the release window very soon. 

This game will be available on PC, PlayStation®4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and PlayStation® Vita.
